text: Something is surely wrong looking at the pic. Taste the coffee...yes bullseye. 4 dollars but still considered expensive. I will take local coffee any time!
Mar 2025: opens early for morning coffee. Good place to get a quick pastry bite too. Bottles water reasonably priced.
The moment flat white charged at 4 dollars I know gonna be bad. And it’s the worst flat wi ever had

Always get a my regular caffeine fill here. Staff are great especially William, really gives it his all and more. Knows the regulars by face, name and their usual order. Hand fast leg fast, everything prepared the way you like it. Orders are quick and brisk - one of the few places that offer both coffee and kopi in one place at great prices.
Coffee’s okay. Queue moves fast which is great if you just want a fix after dining in for lunch and before heading back to office
